text: Jesse Thomas may refer to: * Jesse Thomas (musician) (1911–1995), blues guitarist and singer from Louisiana * Jesse Thomas (American football) (1928–2012), American pro football player in the NFL, AFL and CFL * Jesse B. Thomas (1777–1853), U.S. politician * Jesse Thomas (triathlete) (born 1980), American triathlete * Jesse B. Thomas Jr. (1806–1850), Illinois politician ==See also== *Jessie O. Thomas (1885–1972), educator *Jess Thomas (1927–1993), American operatic tenor *Jessica Thomas (disambiguation)
title: Jesse Thomas
